owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: PID Graphical Symbols Ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: An ontology relating the graphical symbols of the ISO10623 and ISO14617 norm to the Posccaesar database

Symbol.rdfs:label: Bag filter / candle filter / cartridge filter for liquids
Bag filter / candle filter / cartridge filter for gases
Evaporator
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Evaporator / heat-exchanger with integrated headspace / kettle reboiler

Symbol.rdfs:label: Dry cooling tower with forced draft
Dry cooling tower with induced draft
Wet cooling tower with forced draft
Wet cooling tower with induced draft
Falling film cooler
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Water-sprayed cooler / spray cooler / falling film cooler

Symbol.rdfs:label: Tray with weir
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Tray with weir and passage of gas

Symbol.rdfs:label: Externals
Symbol.rdfs:comment: External devices that can be fitted to other apparatus, such as for example vessels.

Symbol.rdfs:label: Heated or cooled pipe with insulation

rdf:RDF.Symbol: Siphon <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="#PipingComponent /> ISO10628-2038 ISO14617-2038 Piping and piping components

Symbol.rdfs:label: Slope
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Indicates for example if a pipe is sloped

Symbol.rdfs:label: Spectacle blind closed position
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Spectacle blind / interchangeable disk, closed position

Symbol.rdfs:label: Spectacle blind open position
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Spectacle blind / interchangeable disk, open position

Symbol.rdfs:label: Fluid container
Symbol.rdfs:comment: A container capable of containing substances which behave as fluids, i.e. gases, liquids and fluidized solids.

Symbol.rdfs:label: Vessel with dished roof and conical bottom
Vessel with dished heads and external electric heater
Vessel with dished heads and insultation
Vessel with dished heads and indication of filling level
Process column
Symbol.hasCategory: Vessels, process columns and chemical reactors with internals

Symbol.rdfs:label: Column with trays
Symbol.hasCategory: Vessels, process columns and chemical reactors with internals

Symbol.rdfs:label: Column with fluidized bed
Symbol.hasCategory: Vessels, process columns and chemical reactors with internals

Symbol.rdfs:label: Packed column
Symbol.hasCategory: Vessels, process columns and chemical reactors with internals

Symbol.rdfs:label: Tray column with passage for gas
Symbol.hasCategory: Vessels, process columns and chemical reactors with internals

Symbol.rdfs:label: Bubble-cap tray column
Symbol.hasCategory: Vessels, process columns and chemical reactors with internals

Symbol.rdfs:label: Valve tray column
Symbol.hasCategory: Vessels, process columns and chemical reactors with internals

Symbol.rdfs:label: Packed column with two packing zones and spray nozzles
Symbol.hasCategory: Vessels, process columns and chemical reactors with internals

Symbol.rdfs:label: Butterfly valve
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Valve of butterfly type. In the ISO10628 it is also listed under the Reg.-Nr.X8075, although the usage of X8130 is recommended.

Symbol.rdfs:label: Detonation proof and flame resistant flame arrestor
Mixing chamber
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Mixing chamber / mixing section / mixer path

Symbol.rdfs:label: Coarsening device
Symbol.rdfs:comment: A device designed to increase a materials size, roughness or hardness

Symbol.rdfs:label: Disk drier
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Disk drier / moving shelf drier / turbo drier

Symbol.rdfs:label: Rotary drier
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Rotary drum drier / rotary drier / tumbling drier

Symbol.rdfs:label: Pallet truck
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Pallet jack / pallet truck / pallet pump / pump truck / jigger

Symbol.rdfs:label: Forklift
Symbol.rdfs:comment: Forklift truck / forklift / lift truck / fork truck
